[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com

[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com

[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com

Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv

[Urgent] Academic Manager (IT Center for Kids, Income Up to 17Mil/month)
DigiUni Vietnam is a coding center for kids ages 4 to 18 years old with a big base of offline and online students, we are located in Binh Thanh dist, HCMC. We teach coding languages like Scratch, Python, HTML&CSS, Javascript and also graphic design like Photoshop and etc.
Salary range: base of 10,000,000 VND - 14,000,000 VND gross depending on experience and qualifications, monthly bonus based on performance up to 3,000,000 VND. Combined income is up to 17,000,000 VND/month.
Benefits: Competitive salary & KPI Bonuses, Full on-job training and ongoing professional development, Annual leave, social insurance, young and dynamic working environment, working in an international environment.
Job Description
Manage daily academic operations at the campus
Manage teachers' schedule and be responsible for assigning teachers for classes
Work closely with Customer Care/Sales Manager to ensure all curriculum activity is
scheduled effectively, also cooperate on developing projects and events
Develop and implement innovative teaching practices in consultation with the head of Academic department
Ensure quality and consistency of experience for students across all disciplines.
Represent the company during events or meetings with parents
Undertake lesson observations (QC & random spot check of recordings - online trial & actual
classes as well as joining offline classes), identify training needs and lead staff
training.
Train new and existing members of the academic team
Conduct weekly check-up of the Learning Management system.
Work with HR to recruit new members of the academic team
Teach fixed and trial classes at least 10 hours per week
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Requirements
Bachelor Degree in IT, Software/AI Engineering/Computer Science/Digital Marketing/Multimedia Design or any other related fields
English equivalent to IELTS 6-7
Teaching certificate is preferred
At least 2-3 years of teaching experience and supervisor/manager experience preferred
Passion for education and loves working with children
Great communication skills
Perseverance, hardworking, positive attitude, willing to learn quickly & always improve knowledge further
Technology savv
Please send your CV to maria@digiunivietnam.com
